pullrequest.title: Fix inline namespace for conversion functions

content.raw:
Just a note: I think having the visibility macro here might lead to issues when linking on Windows.

IIRC I’ve run into issues where putting the visibility macro on a template will cause the MSVC linker to look for a definition in a library instead of instantiating the template, which leads to a linker error in most cases because the 

I'm not confident enough in my memory to make a PR to remove it, but I wanted to make some noise here in case someone runs into this problem when we start testing `ign-gazebo` on Windows.
